glsa.title: Cyrus IMAP Server: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: The Cyrus IMAP Server is affected by multiple vulnerabilities which could potentially lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

background.p: The Cyrus IMAP Server is an efficient, highly-scalable IMAP e-mail server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the Cyrus IMAP Server. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An unauthenticated local or remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the Cyrus IMAP Server process or cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cyrus IMAP Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
